tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mutations (
  mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_type VARCHAR(20),
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Mutation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 gene VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 mutation_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 impact VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Disease_Mutation (disease_id INT NOT NULL,
 mutation_id INT NOT NULL,
 PRIMARY KEY (disease_id, mutation_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES Disease(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (mutation_id) REFERENCES Mutation(id));

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  disease VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
  mutation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
  gene_id UUID,
  patient_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
  gene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(100),
  gene_symbol VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
  disease_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(100),
  gene_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES genes(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE associations (
  association_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_id UUID,
  mutation_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES diseases(disease_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (mutation_id) REFERENCES mutations(mutation_id)
)
